Package org.Plexian.Game

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Chunk
    Chunk class to manage large ammount of tiles easily, without putting stress on a lookup-matrix.

    The chunk and world loader and saver.
    Game
    This is the main class that runs the game loop and everything for Pendulum.

    PlexianLogFormatter
